main_definition: to do something in a small or minimal way, not completely; to make a minor change or difference

meanings_and_examples.example: The room was slightly cooler than usual.
She scored slightly better on the second attempt of the test.

meanings_and_examples.definition: with a small degree of intensity, force, or importance
meanings_and_examples.example: The wind was blowing slightly today, so it wasn't very strong.

meanings_and_examples.definition: not completely; to an extent but not fully
meanings_and_examples.example: He has only slightly improved his technique after practicing for a few weeks.
